data.name: madness
data.description: Multiresolution Adaptive Numerical Environment for Scientific Simulation

evidence: README indicates network usage: "Developer documentation generated by doxygen can be found [here](https://m-a-d-n-e-s-s.github.io/madness/api-doc/)."

"Multiresolution Adaptive Numerical Environment for Scientific Simulation" and "provides a high-level environment for the solution of integral and differential equations in many dimensions" indicate it is an application environment for simulations.

"built upon the numerical tools are new applications with initial focus upon chemistry, atomic and molecular physics, material science, and nuclear structure" shows it directly produces scientific simulations/results.
